title: Test Get Choice Function
description: A simple test to verify the get_choice function works correctly

problems.title: Simple Choice Test
problems.content: This problem tests the basic get_choice function. You'll see two buttons and need to click one.
problems.task: Run the code and click one of the buttons that appear. The program will tell you which choice you made.
problems.hint: The get_choice(2) function will show you 2 buttons numbered 1 and 2.
problems.starterCode:
print("You see two doors.")
print("Which door will you choose?")

# get_choice(2) will show 2 buttons
choice = get_choice(2)

if choice == 1:
    print("You chose door 1!")
else:
    print("You chose door 2!")

print(f"The get_choice function returned: {choice}")
problems.expectedOutput:
You see two doors.
Which door will you choose?
You chose door 1!
The get_choice function returned: 1
